subject: Football
Sex Crimes
lead_paragraph: Danny Villa, a high school football coach and a former New England Patriots player, surrendered to the police in his native Arizona on Saturday, one day after a court in Massachusetts issued a warrant for his arrest on charges that he raped a teenager.
